pageTitle: Itinerary for Monday, February 6, 2017 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Monday, February 6, 2017:

Ottawa, Ontario 

11:30 a.m. The Prime Minister will participate in a Q&A with youth leaders from universities across Canada.

Shaw Centre
55 Colonel By Drive
Ottawa, Ontario

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage
  • Media should arrive no later than 11:00 a.m. and should present themselves to room 209


2:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend Question Period.

7:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend a reception to celebrate Black History Month.

Canadian Museum of History         
Grand Hall
100 Laurier Street
Gatineau, Quebec

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage
  • Media should arrive no later than 6:00 p.m.
